overwork.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to work too much or to make someone work too much
overwork.translation[0].definitions[0].e: You’ve been overworking – why don’t you take a week off?
Have they been overworking you again?
overwork.translation[1].definitions[0].e: a heart attack brought on by overwork
overwork.translation[2].definitions[0].d: when someone works too much or too hard
overwork.translation[2].definitions[0].e: What kinds of health problems accompany the stress from overwork?
